places.name: Masai Mara Migration Safari (4 Days)
places.description: Witness the legendary Great Migration, spot the Big Five, and enjoy sundowners in the heart of Kenya's most famous reserve.

places.name: Amboseli & Tsavo Combo (5 Days)
places.description: Breathtaking views of Mount Kilimanjaro and red elephants of Tsavo in one scenic adventure. Tsavo boasts vast, rugged terrain and diverse animal species.

places.name: Nairobi Day Tour
places.description: Perfect for short stays — visit Nairobi National Park, the Giraffe Centre, Elephant Orphanage, and Karen Blixen Museum. Visitors see giraffes against the backdrop of the city skyline.

places.name: Diani Beach Extension (3-5 Days)
places.description: Unwind after your safari on Kenya's award-winning white-sand beaches with optional snorkeling or dhow cruises. This a stunning stretch of white sand on Kenya's southern coast

places.name: Cultural Immersion Experience
places.description: Spend a day or two with local Maasai — learn traditions, dance, and craft making in a respectful, guided setting. Get the chance to meet people known for their colorful clothing and beadwork.
